alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Laurel (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:49PM EDT until July 18 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LAUREL...NORTHWESTERN OWSLEY...SOUTHEASTERN ESTILL...JACKSON...EAST CENTRAL ROCKCASTLE AND SOUTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 849 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McKee, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Turkey Foot around 855 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Earnestville, Delvinta and Pebworth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
